description: This blueberry muffin recipe is quick and easy to make and requires minimal ingredients. It may just become your go-to muffin recipe.
name: Blueberry Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Sift flour into a large bowl. Add sugar and stir until combined. Whisk butter, milk, vanilla and eggs in a large jug. Add to flour mixture and stir until just combined. Fold through blueberries. Spoon mixture evenly into paper cases. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Serve.

Sift flour into a large bowl. Add sugar and stir until combined. Whisk butter, milk, vanilla and eggs in a large jug. Add to flour mixture and stir until just combined. Fold through blueberries. Spoon mixture evenly into paper cases. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Serve.
